name: 世阳教你学防灾Shiyang teaches you to learn disaster prevention
description: "Shi Yang teach you to prevent disaster prevention" is a popular science simulation game, the player through the operation of the game characters to learn meteorological disaster prevention knowledge, such as snowstorm, dust storms, floods and other common sense.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7+ Processor: Intel Z8300 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: intel hd 4000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card:  Additional Notes:
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: intel hd 4000 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card:  Additional Notes:
